item.description:
NEW MEETUP CARPOOL PLACE.  There is a park and ride off of I91 Exit 12 in Wilder.  Coming North on I91, go right off the exit and go to the end of the road.  take a right on Rt 5, and the parking lot is just down the road on the right. 

Parking is very tight at the trailhead. So we can meet at 9AM at the park and ride above.  We will plan to be on the trail by 10AM.  Please let me know if you will be carpooling or meeting at the trailhead.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: CLIMB CARDIGAN via the South Ridge Trail
